caption: "A possibly metallic vase-type object with a dark, reflective surface and a cylindrical shape. The tapered rim suggests it may be designed for holding flowers or decorative items. While resembling a vase, the presence of what appears to be a small plant inside indicates its use as a planter. Inconclusive evidence for its exact function due to varying viewpoints. Found on a kitchen countertop alongside other plants and kitchenware."
